bibl.title: The Arabs in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt through Papyri and Inscriptions.
bibl.note: The historical background of the Arab relations with Egypt, the Eastern Desert of Egypt called "Arabia", the "arabarchai" and the "arabotoxotai" and other mentions of Arabs.

bibl.title: Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987

bibl.seg: Abd El Ghany Mohamed El Sayed, The Arabs in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt through Papyri and Inscriptions.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 233-242.
The historical background of the Arab relations with Egypt, the Eastern Desert of Egypt called "Arabia", the "arabarchai" and the "arabotoxotai" and other mentions of Arabs.
